articles.description: Newcastle United and the Toon Army waited two decades for a Champions League night like this and it was worth every day, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Newcastle win worth the 20-year wait for Toon fans'

articles.description: Julian Alvarez scores a fantastic late winner as Manchester City recover from back-to-back defeats to beat Leipzig in the Champions League.
articles.title: Alvarez and Doku help Man City to late Leipzig win

articles.description: Celtic endure late heartbreak as Pedro's 95th-minute winner consigned the Scottish champions to another Champions League defeat.
articles.title: Lazio strike 95th-minute winner to stun Celtic

articles.description: The World Cup is far from perfect and may even be 50-over cricket's fight for survival, but it should still be a superb tournament, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Imperfect World Cup is a fight for survival'

articles.description: Watch Simone Biles' floor routine as she leads the USA to their seventh consecutive team gold at the World Gymnastics Championships in Antwerp.
articles.title: 'Smiles of joy!' - Biles leads USA to team gold

articles.description: Newcastle United welcome Champions League football back to St. James' Park in style as Paris St-Germain were overpowered in a highly-charged atmosphere.
articles.title: Dominant Newcastle roar to home victory over PSG

articles.description: The 2030 World Cup will he held across Uruguay, Argentina, Paraguay, Spain, Portugal and Morocco, Fifa confirms.
articles.title: 2030 World Cup to be held across three continents

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says a replay of the match against Tottenham "would be the right thing" after Luis Diaz's goal was wrongly disallowed.
articles.title: Klopp wants Spurs-Liverpool replay after VAR error

articles.description: RFU chief executive Bill Sweeney says the game is "on the cusp of something quite spectacular" as it attempts to rebuild after a turbulent period.
articles.title: Rugby 'on cusp of something spectacular' - Sweeney

articles.description: Get in the mood for the 2023 men's Cricket World Cup by reliving the closing stages of the 2019 final.
articles.title: How England won incredible World Cup final
